metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7827 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Botan before 1.10.13 and 1.11.x before 1.11.22 make it easier for remote attackers to conduct million-message attacks by measuring time differences, related to decoding of PKCS#1 padding.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> "Fixed in 1.11.22. Affected all previous versions."

criterions.comment: botan1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
